snippet: Mr. Lasansky was known for his multiprocess prints, as well as a series of drawings depicting the horrors of Nazism.
abstract: Mauricio Lasansky, an Argentinian-born master printmaker who was equally well known for a series of drawings depicting the horrors of Nazism, dies at age 97.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lasansky was known for his multiprocess prints, as well as a series of drawings depicting the horrors of Nazism.

headline.seo: Mauricio Lasansky, Master Printmaker, Dies at 97
headline.main: Mauricio Lasansky, Master Printmaker, Dies at 97
headline.print_headline: Mauricio Lasansky, 97; Left Imprint in Two Media
